text: Dobroniega is a Slavic name which contains word "dobro" - good, goodness and "niega" - delight, and may refer to: * Dobroniega of Poland - a Polish princess member of the House of Piast and by marriage Margravine of Lusatia. * Maria Dobroniega of Kiev - a Slavic princess member of the Rurikid dynasty ==See also== * Polish name * Slavic names Category:Given names Category:Slavic feminine given names Category:Czech feminine given names Category:Polish feminine given names Category:Slovene feminine given names
title: Dobroniega
